resources.string: Allows you to wake the device by double tapping on the screen.

Allows you to connect USB devices. When activated other device related USB functions, such as ADB and MTP, will not be available until this is disabled or the device is rebooted. Not all USB devices will work.
Increases the sensitivity of the touch screen so touches can be registered while wearing gloves.
Enables the second sim card slot. This should not be activated unless there is a sim card in the second slot. (Requires Reboot!)

This works around issues with Snapchat, Instagram and other video recording apps. Uses the google avc encoder instead of the hw avc encoder. You may need to restart the app or restart the device before this setting takes effect. This may also cause some video recording apps not to work.
Thank you all for you support!
